name: Garden
description: Garden is a cross-chain bridge enabling fast and efficient Bitcoin swaps. It is built using Catalog protocol which uses atomic swaps to facilitate trustless conversions. These swaps are entirely peer-to-peer, removing the need for any wrapping/unwrapping or AMMs. Garden launched in December 2023, with support for BTC to WBTC swaps on Ethereum. It has since expanded to Arbitrum, with more chains in the pipeline.
